title: Teenager shot in Virginia Beach Saturday evening
content:
VIRGINIA BEACH, Va. – Police are investigating a shooting that sent one person to the hospital.
The call came in Saturday evening at 5:51 p.m. about a shooting in the 700 block of Hayes Avenue.
When officers arrived to the scene they located a 15 to 17 year-old female suffering from a non-life threatening gunshot wound.
The victim was transported to a local hospital.
At this time, there is no suspect information.
Anyone with information is asked to call 1-888-LOCK-U-UP or by texting “VBTIP” and the information to CRIMES (274637).
Stay with WTKR.com for more updates.
